jtorrent.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • jtorrent.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Client that shares and downloads a torrent. Created by Xavier on 4/30/17.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Client.Announcer
      Private Runnable class that sends periodic announce messages to the tracker server.
      private class  Client.AnnouncerRMI
      Announcer that uses an RMI connection to a tracker server, rather than a socket connection.

    • Method Detail

      • newLeecher

        public static Client newLeecher(java.net.InetAddress address,
                                int port,
                                JTorrent torrent)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new leecher. A client that doesn't have a file and needs to download it.
        Parameters:
        address - IP address of the client.
        port - Listening port of the client.
        torrent - Torrent
        Returns:
        Client (leecher).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On SocketConnection failure.

      • newSeeder

        public static Client newSeeder(java.net.InetAddress address,
                               int port,
                               JTorrent torrent,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new seeder. A client that uploads file chunks.
        Parameters:
        address - IP address
        port - Listening port
        torrent - Torrent
        file - File being shared (info held in torrent)
        Returns:
        Seeder client
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts a peer by sending announce messages to the tracker server and listening for incoming peer connections.

      • getSeedingPeers

        public java.util.ArrayList<JPeer> getSeedingPeers()
        Returns a list of seeding peers on this network. Used by the LeecherHandler class.
        Returns:
        List of seeding peers on the network.

      • setSeedingPeers

        private void setSeedingPeers(java.util.ArrayList<JPeer> peers)
        Used to update the list of seeding peers on this network after each announce message response from the tracker server.
        Parameters:
        peers - Updated list of seeding peers on the network.
